title: api-metadata
description: An API metadata descriptor to facilitate generating Azure Function endpoints

functionPrefix.description: A prefix to add to each function name

projectName.description: The name of the API project for human friendly naming

folders.description: A list of folder configuration to store different elements of the API construct

models.description: An array of schemas used to generate JSON models. These schemas drive the type definition and the JSON validation when Requests are submitted

items.description: An object describing the model including its schema

endPoints.description: An array of enitty definitions, that translates to endpoints
